name: xp01disjl

stmt.origin: mp2b(wceq(cin(cxp(csn(emptycls), c0), cxp(csn(c1o), c1)), emptycls), wne(emptycls, c1o), wceq(cin(csn(emptycls), csn(c1o)), emptycls))

comment: Cartesian products with the singletons of ordinals 0 and 1 are disjoint. (Contributed by Jim Kingdon, 11-Jul-2023.)
